title: Why You Need To Be Using YouTube Shorts
description: YouTube Shorts are the latest YouTube growth hack that creators have used to grow exponentially in views and subscribers. Reed Duchscher, manager of some of the internet's biggest creators like MrBeast and Preston, breaks down everything you need to know about YouTube Shorts and how to best incorporate it into your YouTube Strategy.
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
itunes:summary: YouTube Shorts are the latest YouTube growth hack that creators have used to grow exponentially in views and subscribers. Reed Duchscher, manager of some of the internet's biggest creators like MrBeast and Preston, breaks down everything you need to know about YouTube Shorts and how to best incorporate it into your YouTube Strategy.
